snippet.title: To Gather Trailer #SBGames2020
snippet.description:
Download and Play at: https://lcpgames.itch.io/to-gather

You've come right on time: help is much needed here at Margaret's farm.

Or you would be just in time — if only Margaret would accept any help.

Since her daughter left after they got into a huge argument, Margaret has been running the farm all by herself. And gosh darn it, that’s a whole lotta chores! She just plain refuses to hire an extra pair of hands, as she expects her daughter will be returning anytime soon. To top it all off, somehow she hasn't slept since it all began. Talk about a rough patch, huh, partner? But it seems she found just the cure for her insomnia. It just seems a bit far-fetched, If you ask me...

Play as Margaret as she tries to remember the correct whistle notes to guide Lassie, the dog, around the pasture. Use Lassie to herd the sheep from one area to the next, until Margaret is satisfied!
